あれから――シリウスシュガーを中心にプレ・クラス－Ａの援護もあり、\nなんとか巨:
Since then—with Sirius Sugar at the center—I’ve had Pre-Class-A support as well
Somehow, I managed to defeat the giant maise shifter.
――が、その代償は決して小さくはなかった。: —But the price was by no means small.
はぁ……はぁ……\nみんな、大丈夫……ですか……？:
Hah... hah...
Are you... all right...?
こっちは大丈夫、でも、ジュリーとラウラが……: I'm fine here, but Julie and Laura...
名前の挙がった２機は戦闘不能だ。\n装甲はズタズタになり、各部位の損傷も激しい。:
The two Named Machines are incapable of fighting.
The armor was shredded, and the damage to each part was severe.
幸い、コックピット内のパイロット自体は無事で、\n軽傷だが……これ以上、ここに留:
Fortunately, the pilot inside the cockpit itself was safe
It’s only a minor injury, but... it’s dangerous to stay here any longer.
……安全を確保次第、２機を連れて全速離脱する。\n損傷の少ない機体で抱えるんだ。:
...As soon as we're safe, we'll take the two of them and leave at full speed.
Carry it with less damage.
メイズシフターは倒したけれども、まだ弱いながらも息をしている。\n不用意に刺激す:
I've defeated the Mayse-Sifter, but it's still breathing despite its weakness.
If I carelessly stimulated her, she might use the last of her strength to attack me.
だから誰も近づけない。\nじりじりとしたにらみ合いが、精神と体力を削っていく──:
That's why no one can get close.
Slowly but surely, the staring contest was whittling away at my spirit and stamina~
突如として銃声が響く。\nちゆるの弾丸がメイズシフターに命中し、咆哮を上げた。:
Suddenly, a gunshot rang out.
Chiyuru's bullets hit the maise shifter and roared.
耳を覆いたくなる地響きの中、ちゆるの機体が\n横たわるメイズシフターに近寄った。:
Amid the rumbling of the earth that made me want to cover my ears, the Chiyuru aircraft
I approached the Mayse-Sifter where it lay.
大丈夫、こいつはもう動かないよ。\nさっき撃ち込んだ弾は致命傷だから。:
Don't worry, he won't move anymore.
Because the bullet I fired earlier was fatal.
待て、なぜわかる？ そんなこと。: Wait, how do you know that?
メイズシフターといえど生物だよ。\nここだけはダメって場所は存在する。:
Even a maise shifter is a living thing.
This is the only place I can't go.
よし、安全確保！ みんな、今のうちに撤退だよー。: All right, let's make sure we're safe! Everyone, retreat now!
ちゆるの言葉に、全員がようやく息を吐き、\n緊張の糸が切れるのを感じた。:
At Chiyuru's words, everyone finally exhaled.
I felt the tension drain from my body.
しかしみんなが撤退準備を始める中、\nちゆるだけがメイズシフターのそばを離れない:
However, as everyone began preparing to withdraw...
Chiyuru is the only one who can't leave the Mayz shifter's side.
……いやぁ、こんな種類、この<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>で見たことないで: ...Man, you've never seen this kind of thing before in this <r-cave belt> earth pit zone. Besides, it's easily beyond my imagination.
ね、ちょっと調べていってもいい！？\nすぐに終わらせるからさぁ！:
Hey, can I take a look around?!
I'll finish this in no time!
お前……こんな非常事態だぞ……: You... This is an emergency situation...
いつになく真面目なトーンの声に、\n俺は少し面食らってしまう。:
Her unusually serious tone of voice made me realize...
I was a little taken aback.
メイズのことで知らないことなんて、少ない方がいい。\n知識があれば、非常事態でも:
The fewer things I don’t know about Mayse, the better.
With my knowledge, I can deal with emergencies.
『無知は人を苛む病であり、\n短慮は無知から生まれる魔物である』ってね。:
“Ignorance is a disease that torments people,
Indiscretion is a monster born of ignorance.'
聞いたことがない格言だな。誰の言葉だ？: I've never heard that saying before. Whose words are those?
え？ あたし。今考えた。: Huh? I just thought about it.
……お前の能天気さが、今は羨ましいよ。: ...I'm jealous of how carefree you are right now.
てかさ、撤退しないの？\nみんな行っちゃうよ？:
Aren't you going to withdraw?
Everyone's leaving, you know?
バカ。お前だけ置いていけるわけないだろ。: Idiot. There's no way I can leave you alone.
……はは。丸腰で言っても、カッコつかないよ？: ...Haha. Even if you say it unarmed, you won't look cool.
メイズを脱出し、地上に帰還した俺達。\nようやく無事に戻ってこれた実感が湧いてき:
We escaped from Mayse and returned to the surface.
I finally feel like I've made it back safely.
ぐすっ……ううぅ、すみません。\n私のために、みなさんボロボロに……:
*sniffle*... Ugh, I'm sorry.
Everyone fell apart for my sake...
みんなを無事に帰らせるのが、リーダーの役目なのに。\nこんなんじゃ、理想のリーダ:
Even though it was the leader’s duty to get everyone home safely.
At this rate, I'll never be the ideal leader...!!
あなた達は、生きて帰ってきました。\n誇るべきことであり、まぎれもない勝利です。:
You guys came back alive.
It is something to be proud of, and an unmistakable victory.
そうです！ 生きてれば勝ちです！\nあんな怖い敵にも、負けませんでした！！:
That's right! As long as you're alive, you win!
I couldn't lose to such a scary enemy!!
ま、機体はボロボロだけど、名誉の負傷って感じで。ねえ？: Well, the aircraft is in tatters, but it feels like an honorable injury. Right?
大事なのは、みんなで帰ってこれたこと。\nそれはこれからも変わらない。:
What was important was that we all came home together.
That won't change from now on.
プレ・クラス－Ａのみんなも、小さく頷いている。: Everyone in Pre-Class-A was nodding slightly.
予想外のことではあったが、\n困難を乗り越えた達成感も、本物だった。:
It was unexpected, but...
The sense of accomplishment that had overcome the hardships was real, too.
（ともかく、今日の事は生徒会長にも報告しないとな……）: (Anyway, I need to report today's events to the Student Council President...)
翌日――俺とシリウスシュガーの５人は、生徒会室に来ていた。: The next day—Sirius Sugaru and I—the five of us came to the student council room.
……そうですか。ではプレ・クラス－Ａの生徒達は、無事なのですね。: ...I see. Then the students of Pre-Class-A are safe.
ああ。幸いにも軽傷だった。でも作戦時間が長くなったから、\nメイズシンドロームの:
Yeah. Fortunately, it was a minor injury. But the operation time was longer, so...
I've been given an examination, considering the possibility of a mace syndrome.
まずは無事に全員帰還できたことに感謝を。\nそして……昨日現れたという巨大メイズ:
First of all, thank you all for making it back safely.
And...about the giant maise shifter that appeared yesterday.
……あまりにも不自然だ。<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>のような浅層で、\n:
...It was far too unnatural. The <r-cave belt> was a shallow layer like the earthen belt </r>
It was unlikely that such a powerful individual would appear.
うん、重力異常の影響も少ない帯域だよ。\nはっきり言って、環境的にあり得ないと断:
Yeah, it's a band that doesn't have much effect on gravitational anomalies.
To put it bluntly, I can say for sure that it's impossible from an environmental perspective.
だとすればあいつの出現は意図的なもの……\n陰謀に巻き込まれた、ってことになるな:
If that's the case, then his appearance was intentional...
That means I've been caught up in a conspiracy.
私も、そう考えています。これを。: That's what I think, too. This.
会長が見せてきたのは、\nとあるネット記事だった。:
Pres shows me...
It was a certain article on the internet.
これはつい先ほど公開・拡散された記事です。: This is an article that was released and spread just a little while ago.
『訓練中、シリウスシュガーの指導によりＭＧ２機が大破、\n特別養成校舎プレ・クラ:
“During training, the MG2 machine was severely damaged by Sirius Sugar’s instruction
[Special Training School Pre-Class-A students are injured.]
『新人指揮官の危険な指導法に懸念の声』……ね。\nタイミングが良すぎるぞ、まった:
'The rookie commander's voice of concern over the dangerous guidance method'... Right?
The timing is way too perfect, geez.
まるで事前に準備したかのような記事ですわね。\nそれにこの写真は、いったいどこか:
It's as if the article was prepared beforehand.
And where did this picture come from?
初めから仕組まれていたんだな……: It must have been planned from the start...
ええ……ですが皆さんは勝利しました。\n巨大なメイズシフターを撃破した。:
Yes... But you all won.
I destroyed the giant maise shifter.
この件は、生徒会から正式に発表いたします。\nあなた方の責を問う声は、起こさせま:
This matter will be officially announced by the student council.
I won't let you raise your voice asking for your blame.
ですから……改めて、感謝を。プレ・クラス－Ａ４名を鍛え、\nあの戦いで全員無事帰:
So... thank you again. I've trained Pre-Class-A4,
That everyone had returned safely in that battle.
これは、私達に仕掛けられた陰謀の一部を打ち砕き、\n最悪の事態を回避できたという:
This will destroy some of the plots that have been set up for us
We were able to avoid the worst-case scenario.
そりゃ、どうも……って、待て。一部ってどういうことだ？: Well, thanks... Wait. What do you mean by part of it?
生徒会長は目を少し伏せた後、\n横目でちゆるを見た。:
The student council president lowers her eyes a little, and then...
I give her a sidelong glance.
次に映し出された記事は、予想外のものだった。\nひとりの少女の顔写真とともに、大:
The next article on the screen was unexpected.
Along with a photo of a girl's face, there's a big headline.
Ｔ２元素の単離に成功した『天才少女』の正体――: The true identity of the “genius girl” who’d successfully isolated the T2 element—
シリウスシュガー所属・月ヶ瀬ちゆる、その衝撃の経歴――\n重力制御研究はすでに実:
Chiyuru Tsukigase, a member of Sirius Sugaru, had a shocking history—
Gravity control research is already in its practical stages? The expert testimonies—
な……なんで……\nどこにも、発表なんかしてないはず……:
Wh-Why...?
There shouldn't be any announcements anywhere...
記事を見て、青ざめたちゆるが、\nしぼり出すような声でつぶやく。:
When I looked at the article, I realized that I had gone pale.
She mutters in a voice that sounds like she's squeezing it out.
……すみません。ここまでは読み切れませんでした。\n標的は生徒会ではなく、あなた:
...I'm sorry. I couldn't read this far.
So the target wasn't the student council, but you.
